ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The organization strongly believes that if we dream for holistic development of the society than we will have to touch each and every aspect, which effects directly or indirectly to the society and are obstacles in the path of social development. To keep in view this ideology New Lakshya Social and Environmental Development Society has adopted the strategy of Integrated Development & Management of the society. We believe that the initiative has been taken up by Society, will receive all your cooperation to make this dream come true. The main Aim of the Organization is to serve the masses through socieo economic in semi urban & rural areas. The philosophy of the organization is to carry its aim & Objectives for which the NGO has been formed to carry out the above projects with full vigor sincerity keeping complete Liaoning with Government state & Centre department & other Charitable Institution & foundation in Indian & in other countries of the world. sourceOfFunds.purpose: Education For School in Nimar Region of Khargoan District of Madhya Pradesh. Individual Sponsorships for students of NARMADALAYA had been received in order to run the activities. Rs. 3000 per child per year sponsorship is provided. Vocational training programs in 11 villages. . In addition to these activities Nimar Abhyuday rural management and development association conducted vocational training programs for women and youths of this region. Individual donations were also received for buying

No funding from Corporate Social Responsibility was received so far. Individual funding for student Sponsorship had been received in the 2014-2015. These Funds were utilized for students who are school leftouts.along with this, vocational training programs were conducted for women and youths from Nimar Region of Khargoun District of Madhya pradesh. A Diploma course in Tailoring was initiated for women and plumbing and welding courses were initiated for the youths as a mean of livelihood.
Along with Individual donations, Grants out of GIC RE CSR for midday meals, Salary of NARMADALAYA teachers and teachers training program were received.

Individual Donation, Grants from GIC RE towards salary of teachers of Rs. 7, 87, 500, Cost for two vehicles (Force Tofaan) Rs. 20, 50, 000 and Advance grant of Rs. 5 lakh received on 23rd march 2016 for solar project from Yuvotkarsh trust, Pune.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: 1. Appointment of a fully dedicated team which will carry out the project and which will be developed into a local resource 2. Project Inception Training of project staff to build capacities so that the they are able to work towards fulfilling the objectives of the project 3. Village level mobilization campaigns, meetings and door-to-door contact to spread awareness about Different Development / welfare Schemes and its provisions 4. Meetings with PRI representatives and discussions about the details of collaboration, expression of commitment by local teams to help panchayats 5. Obtaining formal Panchayat resolutions expressing keenness to work with local NGO and its team and affirming commitment to the partnership 6. Discussions on increasing work demand at the village level through village meetings 7. Exposure visits of panchayat functionaries and people from the villages to successful watershed/NRM projects where they understand the value of this type of work and are committed to integrating them 8. Capacity building of panchayat functionaries on Different Development / welfare Schemes and NREGA and its provisions 9. Capacity building of panchayat functionaries on NRM and the types of interventions that are possible 10. Participatory planning exercises with village people, for identification of possible work which can be integrated into the Different Rural Development / welfare Schemes and plan 11. Preparation of draft detailed action plan and budget for NREGA works by Project Team and panchayat functionaries
